message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you this product at a price of $11,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your offer, but I can't go lower than $10,500.  This product is in high demand, and I'm confident in its value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't think it's worth more than that
